thread.title: Bethany Hillman

author: Bethany Hillman
title: Bethany Hillman
text: This company is a fake, they have sold me something which is a lie! They didn't have a clue what they were selling an now I've discovered and I've been trying to get in contact its been brushed off as they gesture information, its not their problem if its wrong they just have to sell me what I want! That was the response I received! They need to be shut down! I'm now Â£400 out of pocket due to this scam.
